lblExportDescr: This is where you can export all of your data from the database. Please be aware that this export will be a complete backup, including data from all of your personas used across all of your sites.
lblExportReqJS: JavaScript is required for this function. Please enable the feature in your browser temporarily.
lblPostDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this post? There is no undo
lblSettingsDescr: This is where you can change how people see your website.
lblAccountDescr: Here you can control aspects of your account on 10Centuries.
lblAccountSubRemindMsg: Would you like to receive a reminder when your subscription is about to renew? You will be given 1 month notice for an annual subscription and 7 days for a monthly subscription. You can end the reminders at any time by toggling the button below.
lblPaypalSubscribe: Starting a 10Centuries subscription makes it possible to build new functions and features more quickly as well as supporting the month-to-month cost of running the service. Everyone with a subscription can request 10GB of storage on the 10C Cloud service, allowing you to easily share, backup, and synchronise files across all your devices.
lblPaypalUnsubscribe: Would you like to unsubscribe? Click the End Subscription button and you'll be taken to PayPal to do so.
lblPaypalTipJar: Would you like to contribute to the tip jar? Click the Contribute button and send any amount you'd like. Your support makes it possible for new functions and features to be added to the service sooner.
lblSubscribeDescr: This is where you can choose what kinds of items will appear in the syndication feed you subscribe to. Want just some types of posts? Want everything? No problem! You have complete control.
lblSubscribeS1: Choose the Items You'd Like to Receive
lblSubscribeS2: Choose the Format You'd Like to Receive
lblContactThankYou: Thank you for getting in touch!
msgLoginNote: Enter your account credentials here to sign into this website. Don't have an account? You can create one here.
msgLoginNoDice: Either the login name or the password you provided isn't quite right. Please try again.
msg403Result: Sorry, but you do not have access to this page.
msg404Result: Sorry! The requested page could not be found or it is currently unavailable.
msgMissingPass: Please Set a Really Good Password
msgMissingText: Please Enter Some Text to Encrypt
msgMissingUnlockPass: Please Enter the Password to Decrypt the Message
